item.title: Hack The Mac 2015
item.author: clburlison@gmail.com (Clayton Burlison)
item.description: I almost missed Hack the Mac this year but luckily Twitter let me know once it had already started. Since I showed up late, I missed the first project overview and needed to go back to the video on demand to review what was said. While I was watching I thought it might be useful for others if I compiled a short overview with video links. All three projects were already brought to my attention before the event but here is my take away after watching the event:
